descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!A new update for Ferdi is available.
!!!Ferdi is currently locked. Please unlock Ferdi with your password to see your messages.
!!!Using a Franz account to log in?
!!!Try importing your Franz account into Ferdi
!!!Your new password was sent to your email address
!!!No user affiliated with that email address
!!!We have a special treat for you.
!!!Enjoy the full Franz Professional experience completely free for 14 days.
!!!Your free trial ends automatically after 14 days
!!!Sorry, we could not activate your trial!
!!!By creating a Ferdi account you accept the
!!!A user with that email address already exists
!!!Could not load services and user information
!!!There were errors while trying to perform an authenticated request. Please try logging out and back in if this error persists.
!!!Please upgrade your account to use more than {count} services.
!!!Please upgrade to the Franz Professional plan to use custom urls & self hosted services.
!!!Optionally, you can change your Ferdi server by clicking the cog in the bottom left corner.
!!!If you don't need your Ferdi account any longer, you can delete your account and all related data here.
!!!You have received an email with a link to confirm your account deletion. Your account and data cannot be restored!
!!!Please update your billing info to continue using {license} after your trial period.
You are using Ferdi without an account. If you want to use Ferdi with an account and keep your services synchronized across installations, please select a server in the Settings tab then login.
!!!Sorry, but no service matched your search term.
!!!To add a custom service, copy the recipe folder into:

!!!Your user files will be inserted into the webpage so you can customize services in any way you like. User files are only stored locally and are not transferred to other computers using the same account.
!!!To add self hosted services, you need a Ferdi Premium Supporter Account.
!!!You will be notified about all new messages in a channel, not just @username, @channel, @here, ...
!!!When disabled, all notification sounds and audio playback are muted
!!!Please restart Ferdi after changing proxy Settings.
!!!Proxy settings will not be synchronized with the Ferdi servers.
!!!Sorry, but no service matched your search term.
!!!Sending telemetry data allows us to find errors in Ferdi - we will not send any personal information like your message data! Changing this option requires you to restart Ferdi.

!!!By default, Ferdi will keep all your services open and loaded in the background so they are ready when you want to use them. Service Hibernation will unload your services after a specified amount. This is useful to save RAM or keeping services from slowing down your computer.
!!!Minutes of inactivity, after which Ferdi should automatically lock. Use 0 to disable
!!!This server will be used for the "Franz Todo" feature. (default: https://app.franztodos.com)

!!!Please make sure to set a password you'll remember.
If you loose this password, you will have to reinstall Ferdi.

!!!Password Lock allows you to keep your messages protected.
Using Password Lock, you will be prompted to enter your password everytime you start Ferdi or lock Ferdi yourself using the lock symbol in the bottom left corner or the shortcut CMD/CTRL+Shift+L.
!!!Times in 24-Hour-Format. End time can be before start time (e.g. start 17:00, end 09:00) to enable Do-not-Disturb overnight.
!!!Scheduled Do-not-Disturb allows you to define a period of time in which you do not want to get Notifications from Ferdi.
!!!Universal Dark Mode tries to dynamically generate dark mode styles for services that are otherwise not currently supported.
!!!Write your accent color in a CSS-compatible format. (Default: #7367f0)
!!!Help us to translate Ferdi into your language.
!!!Ferdi cache is currently using {size} of disk space.
!!!You are using the latest version of Ferdi
!!!Official translations are English & German. All other languages are community based translations.
!!!Do you like Ferdi? Spread the love!
!!!Your are currently using Franz Servers, which is why you have access to Team Management.

!!!Franz's Team Management allows you to manage Franz Subscriptions for multiple users. Please keep in mind that having a Franz Premium subscription will give you no advantages in using Ferdi: The only reason you still have access to Team Management is so you can manage your legacy Franz Teams and so that you don't loose any functionality in managing your account.
!!!Teams are currently only available when using the Franz Server and after paying for Franz Professional. Please change your server to https://api.franzinfra.com to use teams.
!!!Upgrade your account and get the full Franz experience
!!!Franz 5 comes with a wide range of new features to boost up your everyday communication - batteries included. Check out our new plans and find out which one suits you most!
!!!Yes, start the free Franz Professional trial
!!!Get the free 14 day Franz Professional Trial
!!!Your free trial ends automatically after 14 days
!!!Your trial was successfully activated. Happy messaging!
!!!Yes, I want the free 14 day trial of Franz Professional
!!!Your free trial ends automatically after 14 days
!!!Show message badge for all new messages
!!!Keep Ferdi in background when closing the window
!!!Synchronize dark mode with my OS's dark mode setting
!!!Show unread message badge when notifications are disabled
!!!Get the free Franz Professional 14 day trial and skip the line
!!!Yes, I want the free 14 day trial of Franz Professional
!!!It's time to make a choice. Franz works best on our Personal and Professional plans. Please have a look and choose the best one for you.
!!!More services, no waiting - ideal for personal use.
!!!Unlimited services and professional features for you - and your team.
!!!You're about to downgrade to our Free account. Are you sure? Click here instead to get more services and functionality for just {currency}{price} a month.
!!!Publishing your debug information helps us find issues and errors in Ferdi. By publishing your debug information you accept Ferdi Debugger's privacy policy and terms of service
!!!There was an error while trying to publish the debug information. Please try again later or view the console for more information.
!!!Your debug log was published and is now availible at
!!!Select a service with TAB, ↑ and ↓. Open a service with ENTER.
!!!You have added {amount} of {limit} services. Please upgrade your account to add more services.
!!!Tell your friends and colleagues how awesome Ferdi is and help us to spread the word.
!!! I've added {count} services to Franz! Get the free app for WhatsApp, Messenger, Slack, Skype and co at www.meetfranz.com
!!! I've added {count} services to Franz! Get the free app for WhatsApp, Messenger, Slack, Skype and co at www.meetfranz.com /cc @FranzMessenger
!!!Franz Todos are available to premium users now!
!!!Everyone else will have to wait a little longer.
!!!Your free Franz {plan} Trial has expired, please upgrade your account.
!!!You're about to downgrade to our Free account. Are you sure? Click here instead to get more services and functionality for just {currency}{price} a month.
!!!*This option will be overwritten by the global "Keep all workspaces loaded" option.
!!!You are not connected to the internet.
!!!Your Debug Information has been copied to your clipboard.
